revised_title: Early Developmental Stages of Mammalian Ova
tldr: The author describes the early stages of development in mammalian ova, focusing on the cat ovum. They observed the formation of the epiblastic and hypoblastic vesicles and the presence of a membrana limitans hypoblastica, which is a thin membrane separating the epiblast and hypoblast layers. This discovery helps in understanding the early stages of mammalian development and the origin of mesoblastic cells.
